title: Is It Time To Shutter Our Business?
description:
Greg is questioning whether he's doing the right thing by closing his family's 3rd generation jewelry business. - Dr. Laura: "Missing something doesn't mean you regret letting it go."

What major life decisions are you struggling with? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
